objects.ground: A pair of demonhide gloves lay neatly folded upon the ground.

extras.text: Though they are indeed solid black leather, these gloves appear to be covered in thick smoke which emanates from the pores of their surface.  The effect of the distortion from the smoke is akin to a heatwave passing through the desert. Although by appearances they should offer little in the way of protection, these gloves boast the strength and resilience of the demon whose skin they were made from.

objects.ground: A small thin strip of metal lies here.
A nondescript silver ring glimmers in the dirt.
A menacing blade sings a song in your mind...
&9&bA long mace with the word 'N&0&5i&9&bg&0&5h&9&bt&0&5b&9&br&0&5i&9&bn&0&5g&9&be&0&5r&9&b' etched into the shaft lies here humming.&0
An extremely valuable ring of a deity lies here.

extras.text: This is the ring of a god, granted to one who has shown great courage and fortitude in retrieving items of certain value.  The Lord Tanle has, however reserved the right to call on the wearer of this ring if and when it suits his purpose, or may repossess the ring at any time.  The ring is a slender platinum band of rare, incalculable value with a small, pink, white, blue, green, and purple stone laid in the top.

objects.ground: A flame dances here.

extras.text: The flames take the shape of a gown that one may wear...  If one is brave.

objects.ground: A flame flickers here.

extras.text: The flames take the shape of a gown that one may wear...  If one is brave.

objects.ground: A small shining ornament sparkles on the ground.
A large dragonscale lies here.

extras.text: This scale of the fierce beast Wug, though small, sparkles with a promise of hidden depth.  The scale does not quite burn, but does impart a sense of a curious combination of heat, strength, knowledge, and power.

objects.ground: A mask lies here, barely detectable to the naked eye.

extras.text: the inscription reads: if found return to owner Tors
There seems to be some inscription written inside the mask, near the eye-holes.

objects.ground: A slender staff of stars and topped with a swirling cosmic orb hovers above the ground.
A golden ring glows with a red pulse.
A pair of gloves of striking are lying here.

extras.text: There is an eerie sort of quality to these gloves.  They are a cloudy grey color which traps the light shone upon them.  The fingers are long and the gloves appear to have been bent permanently, being most comfortable in the shape of a solid, firm fist.  The materials from which they were created seems rather unusual and could well be supernatural judging by the look of them.

objects.ground: A shining pair of boots lie here.

extras.text: These boots are made of some sort of oddly shiny material.  There are cut-laces up the sides, wrapping around the ankle.  The laces do not appear to end, and there is no visible knot in them.  The boots seem to float just a touch, hovering with a small amount of air between them and the ground on which they rest.  The green-blue coloration seems to melt into any grass or earth they come into contact with.

objects.ground: A thick set of hide armor is hidden among the foliage and brush.

extras.text: This lightweight hide is said to have been worn by the fabled explorer, Aslyfaer during his many expeditions across Caelia.  Crafted from the hides of ravenous blue fog mist beasts and lined with a mythril chain padding, this midnight blue armor gives its wearer an added layer of protection without the cumbersome weight of scale armors.

objects.ground: Bunched nearby, a leathery brown cloak draws your attention.

extras.text: Fashioned of dark brown bat hide, the cloak radiates an aura of enchantment and evil.  A hooded cloak with silver clasps and a small chain between the two to hold it securely in place about one's shoulders, it looks to afford a great deal of comfort and warmth.

objects.ground: A small flame-shaped silver dagger glints in the lighting.
Dropped here, is a silver mace with jagged obsidian shards.
A complete glowing silver and gold amulet lies here.

extras.text: This is an amulet with two breaks in the holding around the large jewel fixed in the center.  The amulet looks as if it has been molded together and held in place by some magical force.  The chain is a luscious silver color and the holder of the bright green gem is a rich golden metal. There is a small inscription reading: &3"A gift to they who completed me."&0

objects.ground: A red and black badge pulsates in the dust.

extras.text: Pulsing with what appears to be a heartbeat, this badge is the remnants of the demons known as the herlequin.  The power it emits adds to the person wearing it, strengthening them with its unholy power.

objects.ground: A long, black tusk with ornate carvings has been dropped here.
A long, slender staff with a golden headpiece floats here.
A strange old robe lies here, stiff as a board.

extras.text: An invisible aura of energy flows all around you as you examine this one of a kind robe.  The essence of death emits a rancid aura from the hardened skin shell which comprises it.  The dried up flesh has been well layered and appears to be very protective.

objects.ground: A longsword of elegance and grace floats here, glowing softly.
A glint from a jewel encrusted dagger beckons your attention.

extras.text: An ornate dagger, it has a jeweled pommel that is wrapped by thin braids that have been dyed a midnight black.  The razor-sharp blade glows slighly as you hold it in your hand.  Etched across the base of the blade, near the pommel, are some obscure arcane runes.
The meaning is unclear but you are certain that the runes are of some ancient arcane origin.  Perhaps they are a keyword for something?

objects.ground: Heaped on the floor here is a mass of blackened chainmail links.

extras.text: Taking a closer look at the chainmail of Kylhar, you see it is constructed of tiny, blackened metal links intertwined in a tight knit fashion to form a lightweight shirt of armor.  Forged into the front of the shirt is a metallic dragon emblem, with its wings spanning from shoulder to shoulder.

objects.ground: A yellowish-orange cloth has been bunched in a corner here.

extras.text: Made of fine silk and dyed a vibrant color, this long and flowing cloak looks quite comfortable though probably doesn't afford one much protection.  A silver chain, connected between two clasps, holds the cloak securely in place about one's shoulders.  The cloak almost seems to shimmer from a reddish orange to yellow depending on how it is viewed.

objects.ground: A serpentine circle of silver eerily floats here.

extras.text: A coruscating silver bracelet, it is fashioned as a thin serpent coiling along the band before the head of the snake meets just inside a small loop at the tail's end.  Inlaid at even intervals along the band are tiny blue diamonds that give the bracelet a look of glittering grandeur.

objects.ground: Atop a lavish pedestal is a golden ceremonial mask.

extras.text: A ceremonial mask of the sun worshippers, it is modeled of pure gold and has two small leather strips for tying the plate snugly in place.  Though decorated on the front with odd swirling patterns in a deep azure ink, the mask is soft and smooth on both sides.  When worn against the face, the cool surface is rather comforting and gives you an overwhelming sense of agility and power.

objects.ground: A pair of chain gauntlets with red scale plating rest here.
A leather cord with a tear shaped piece of silver has been lost here.

extras.text: Said to have been shed from a silver wyrm as she lay dying while her hatchling were butchered by members of the black hearted 'Regis Mortis' troupe, this silver teardrop is encircled with a thin copper wire and anchored to black leather cord.  The tear is frigid to the touch and fills your mind with an eerie clarity and sense of beauty.

objects.ground: Lost and forgotten here, is a small band of silver.

extras.text: A broad band of silver, the legendary ring of Krystophus appears quite ordinary save for a some runic engravings that run the course of the ring.  The ring itself is rather warm and fills your head with a strange, accelerated sensation and low humming as you touch it.

objects.ground: A pair of wire rimmed spectacles sit upon a table here.

extras.text: Rather simplistic in design, the spectacles have a wire thin framing of some burnished alloy and are curled at the ends to hold conveniently behind ones ears.  Through magic enchantment, the symmetrical lenses have been tinted a lemon-yellow shade, thus giving the world an odd hue as they rest at the end of one's nose.

objects.ground: Staked in the ground, is a long sword with a broad cobalt-blue blade.

extras.text: The forty-eight inch long blade is forged of a cobalt blue steel that glows with an eerie azure hue as you examine the legendary bastard sword of Trosper. Forged in the vast depths of some great dwarven stronghold, the blade radiates of powerful magic.  On either side, running the blunt of this illustrious sword is the image of a serpentine creature of flame.  The ivory hilt is intricately carved to the likeness of a dragon's claw, with its razor sharp talons clutching a deep cerulean gemstone in its grasp.  Engraved just above the hand guard in gold inlay, are some runic symbols of unknown arcane origin.

objects.ground: A heavy black axe with dual blades is wedged into the ground here.

extras.text: Made from a blackened metal, the large axe has two blades running opposite sides.  Each blade is ornately carved with tribal markings that glow a dark blue when the axe is held.  The shaft is of the same composition and there is an arcane inscription that reads around the base of the hilt.
The inscription reads: Niamh

objects.ground: A sliver of gold lies here in the dirt, glinting brightly.

extras.text: A tiny hoop of interwoven gold, it's about one-fourth the size of a coin in diameter and looks to fasten into one's ear.  The links are carefully crafted and reinforced by a sliver of silver that holds the earring in place.

objects.ground: A fiery scimitar lies burning here.

extras.text: Composed entirely of a dark adamantium, the scimitar-shaped blade writhes and crackles as a thick, black smoke billows off its edge while the handle is as cold to the touch as the wintry nights of Mt.  Frostbite.  Balancing the hand guard and mounted at the end of its slope on either side are two perfectly rounded fiery gemstones.

objects.ground: A glimmering set of fine chainmail hovers just off the ground.

extras.text: Composed of tiny metal links interwoven to form a tight knit but lightweight skirt of armor, the mail is padded with a thin layer of leather to prevent chafing.  With some of the links tapered at the end of the skirt, the mail produces a light whisper-like musical tone with excessive movement such as combat.

objects.ground: A glimmering shirt of fine chainmail hovers just off the ground.

extras.text: Composed of tiny metal links interwoven to form a tight knit but lightweight shirt of armor, the mail is padded with a think layer of leather to prevent chafing.  Fastened into the front of the shirt is a thin sheet of metal emblemed to the likeness of cloud dragon.

objects.ground: A small, simple-looking wooden harp floats here.

extras.text: Made of fine oak, the small harp is threaded with silver strings that plays a charming melody when strummed.  Though it is not adorned in any fashion nor ornately designed, it would suffice to provide entertainment and enjoyment.

objects.ground: An antiquated breastplate sits upon the floor here.

extras.text: Though outdated in design, the gothic breastplate is still in excellent condition.  Constructed of adamantium as dark as the moonless night and padded in the shoulders with leather on the underside, it affords one the benefits of heavy armor without having to burden the wearer's encumbrance.  Trailing off the shoulders near the neck opening and down the backside of the breastplate, are two razor-sharp prongs that join near the center of the back.

objects.ground: A knotted lock of platinum hair lies here.

extras.text: Knotted on both ends to keep it from unraveling or disbursing, the lock of hair is soft and smooth to the touch.  The platinum strands radiate a faint aura of holiness and are surrounded by a soft white glow.

objects.ground: A cloak of thick black leather lies here.

extras.text: A thick leather cloak, with a skull pendant and chain for fastening around ones body, it is black like the heart of a lich lord and emits an aura of hate and death.  The blackened aura around the cloak wavers and encompasses all that comes within range.

objects.ground: A pair of ancient-looking plated leggings sit here.
A curiously shaped jet black knife lies here, almost unnoticed.

extras.text: This knife looks as though it were never meant to be.  The blade and handle are made of obviously separate pieces, and you can see nothing binding them together, yet they stay together.  The black dagger reflects no light, and seems to want to be concealed.  From the looks of the blade, chipped as it is, this knife has seen many victims blood.  This knife looks as though it were never meant to be.  The blade and handle are made of obviously separate pieces, and you can see nothing binding them together, yet they stay together.  The black dagger reflects no light, and seems to want to be concealed.  From the looks of the blade, chipped as it is, this knife has seen many victims' blood.

objects.ground: A bandit's black mask lies here, discarded by its previous "owner".

extras.text: The mask is made of a black stretchy fiber, made such that nearly anyone could use it, thus obfuscating whomever may have worn it before.  A faint shimmer surrounds the outward face of the mask, and it seems to slightly skew your view of the area around it.

objects.short: a pair of brown leather boots
objects.ground: A pair of brown leather boots, with intricate designs burnt upon it, lies here.

extras.text: The leather boots have decorative patterns burnt upon the heels.  On the left is an image of a hawk, flying over the sun.  The right heel shows a large nest in a tree,with a large moon in the background.  The boots smell strongly, but not in the normal way of leather, or boots.  A different, unidentifiable smell emanates forth instead.  It's not entirely unpleasant.

objects.ground: A chunk of ruby carved to resemble a heart lies here, attached to a fine gold chain.

extras.text: The ruby must have been quite large to begin with, as the cut version is the size of a human fist.  The ruby is of good quality, with only one major imperfection near the right ventricle.  The ruby seems to pulsate with life, and you could swear you see it pumping as though it were alive.

objects.ground: A pair of eyes, once belonging to a feline, pulsates here.

extras.text: Looking carefully at the eyes, you notice that they aren't in fact, actually cat's eyes - they were artificially crafted to look as such.  Looking into the pupil, you see swirls of green, which give away the magical nature of the eyes. The green swirls nearly enthrall you through their clarity and swirling chaos.

objects.ground: A rather large mace, covered in sharp barbs lies here, unnoticed.

extras.text: The mace is a wicked blood red, and the head of the mace is covered in wisps of sword-sharp barbs.  As a result, being struck with this abomination isn't something that most people would want to experience.  The name Ra' Hul is engraved on the handle, although it is quite faded and somewhat difficult to read.

objects.ground: A tiny pendant has been dropped here.

extras.text: Set atop a golden pin, is crimson red bloodstone.  The inside of the stone churns a black and red like that of some great vortex, swirling all light and lifeblood inside into a crimson marble-like mesh.

objects.ground: A multi-headed flail rests on the ground here.

extras.text: The infamous flail of Reginald, it has 5 heads composed of elongated metal bars.  Each bar has quarter-inch protruding spikes for enhanced damage and is attached to a separate two-foot long chain.  The chain then connects to the flail's handle, an oaken rod half the size of a quarterstaff.  The handle is engraved with ornate markings and inlaid with gemstones near the top and bottom.

objects.ground: A small leather bag with runic inscriptions has been dropped here.
A set of scale-plated bracers lies here.

objects.short: a glowing suit of banded mail
objects.ground: A glowing suit of banded mail lies on the ground.

extras.text: The suit of banded mail appears to be magical.

objects.ground: A small ruby ring lies in the dirt.

extras.text: The ruby is red and sparkles in the sunlight.  It looks like it'd make a good present to give to a good friend.

objects.ground: A very sharp knife lies here.

extras.text: A keen knife, very sharp--you could cut the air in two!

objects.ground: A blue wizard's hat lies here.

extras.text: It's a hat made of blue cloth.  It looks very comfortable.

objects.ground: A black visor sits here.

extras.text: The visor is black and looks like it'd be a good piece of equipment to protect your head.

objects.ground: A small stick lies here.

extras.text: The small stick does not look interesting at all.  But just as you are going to throw it away, you notice some small letters.
It reads 'Hold me'.

objects.ground: There is a huge bastard sword here.

extras.text: Quite a heavy weapon, with a pure white hilt.

objects.ground: A charred dragon's scale is lying here.
A dagger in the shape of a raven has landed here.

extras.text: This legendary dagger, black as the dunnest smoke of the Pit, is forged in the image of a devilish raven in flight, a steel gray blade jutting from its cawing maw.  Imbued with the spirit of a messenger of the Abyss, it merges with the wielder's soul takes wing to see over fields of slaughter and waves of protean fire.

objects.ground: A silver spear is lying here... It glows green!

extras.text: Nothing.

objects.ground: A golden cross has been left here.
A golden suit of armor floats about here.
A cane with an onyx head lies here.

extras.text: The cane is just the right size to use to walk with.  It is beautifully made, with a plain onyx head.

objects.ground: A lost pair of eyeballs are floating here.
A scaly kite shield is lying here.

extras.text: It looks like a kite shield that had a copper dragon hide stretched over it and spinney spikes still intact besides a few scratches it looks like it just came back from the armorer.

objects.ground: A blue leather jerkin is lying here.
The Seer's eyes float here glowing of magic.

extras.text: They appear to be small yellow stones that seers wear next to their eyes to give them sight into the future these might be powerful to help dodge a blow, and even land one too.  Despite you not being a seer.

objects.ground: A grey eye mask is lying here.

extras.text: It appears to be a grey cloth with eye slits that have black mesh covering them.  The mask should cover just about two inches of your face and eyes provide little real protection.

objects.short: a badge of the Templace Guard
objects.ground: An old badge with two swords crossing a shield lay here.

extras.text: It's a small octagonal shield about the size of a human's hand with a two ornate swords criss crossing over the top of it.  The bronze finish could use a good cleaning one third of the shield and swords have been corroded, as if the badge fell from its owner during the great battle for Templace and it was only recently discovered partially buried.  The magic once lent to the guards still courses through the badge bestowing its power to those who wear it.

objects.ground: A long dragon twists around the handle of a broad spear that is resting here.

extras.text: Nothing.

objects.ground: An emotionless white mask lies forgotten here.
A small pair of green dragon eyes rest here.
A long, studded war club is lying here.

extras.text: Crafted from deep brown olive wood by skilled hands, the kanabo is heavy but maneuverable.  Its thick shaft is segmented by rows of iron studs, while old and well used it is clean and well cared for.  Its long handle is a third of the length and carved near where the handle blends into the shaft a few lines of Holy words

And it came to pass that there came a voice as if it were above the cloud of darkness, saying: Repent ye, repent ye, and seek no more to destroy my servants whom I have sent unto you to declare good tidings.  - Helaman 5:29 -

objects.ground: A simple grey leather belt purse lay forgotten here.
A golden fur belt purse lay forgotten here.
A fox pelt belt purse lay forgotten here.
Tens of large thorns bound by a strip of wolf-hide lies here.

extras.text: It looks quite spiky.

objects.ground: The horns of a demon lie here, a trophy of the slaying of the demon.
An innocent white dress lies here.

extras.text: A plain, very clean dress rests softly in your hands.  Its high empire waist and long ruffled sleeves must have been quite attractive on its previous owner. A soft, diaphanous layer of silk covers the entire dress.

objects.short: a crest of the ninja gremlins
objects.ground: You barely notice a small red crest on the ground.

extras.text: A strange symbol indeed, virtually unknown because of the great secrecy involving the organization of the ninja gremlins, it would make a good identifying mark on a cloak...

objects.ground: The slightly curved talon of a dragon lies here without its owner.

extras.text: Rarer than the finest ivory, this dagger inherits all the favorable qualities of its dragonbone material.  Curving slightly from tip to grip, the talon is fantastically smooth, unscratchable by mere mortal weapons.  Somehow a blood-groove has been carved into the backside of the talon, running from the razor-sharp tip to the linen wrapped around the hilt end.  The linen is bloodstained by the talon's victims, and seems continually wet with the lifeblood harvested from the blood-groove.  The talon has been cut and polished at the end of the grip, and an elaborate symbol has been engraved on the face.

A simple engraving is carved into the ivory face, but only unnatural power could have signed with such precision.  The symbol depicts a draconian beast with outstretched wings, a halo hovering above its head.

objects.ground: A humongous silver dragonscale is propped up here.
A broad green leaf flourishes here on a living necklace.
Frost covers the blade of a longsword lying here.
Amethyst rainbows cascade off the shiny surface of a large gemstone here.
A tiny dragon-shaped pendant on a wristlet sits here forlorn.
A tremendously shiny platinum blade sticks out of the ground.
Rainbows shimmer across a large feather lying here.
A slender burial mask gleams golden under a film of dust.

extras.text: The mask is hammered from a large, single mass of smooth gold.  Various jewels glint in its surface, embedded carefully in its facial features.  Two large rubies form the eyes of the mask, perhaps the most prominent feature of the mask.  An aura of power seems to radiate from the mask, causing you to wonder who such a mask might have belonged to.

objects.ground: A thin stretchy tabard lies folded carefully.

extras.text: The tabard is woven tightly from a mysterious, extremely-pliable fabric.  It is little more than a padded vest, brightly-colored and almost gaudy, and across the back, the emblem of a sword and spear are crossed in an apparent gesture of war or protection.

objects.ground: Stunningly magnificent white leather boots stand here.

extras.text: This fantastic pair of personalized high-elven boots appears to be quite new, its glistening white-leather surface and black stitching speaking of my hours of painstakingly-careful labor.  Extra cushioning and padding along the sole ensure the lucky wearer not only comfort, but protection as well.

objects.ground: A gleaming metallic breastplate of pure light floats through the air.

extras.text: Forged by the gods of light themselves, this set of platemail has a powerful supernatural aura about it.  The metal the mail is constructed from is paper thin and exquisitely shined, yet feels as strong and durable as the toughest of steels.  Each plate forming the breastplate slightly overlaps the next, forming a flexible yet protective mesh of celestial armor.  Simple clasps of the same almost-weightless metal attach straps from the front plates to similar plates in the back.  A thin halo of light surrounds the platemail, slightly hazing the gleaming metal surface.  Surely the bearer of this armor has the favor of the gods.

objects.ground: A set of suspiciously sharp teeth sit here chattering.

extras.text: The set of teeth is much sharper than an average human's.  Four matching canines are wickedly pointed, looking like they could tear flesh from bones. Some blood still drips off the tips of the teeth, fresh from their last feeding.

objects.ground: A small metal brooch surrounded by fire is floating just above the ground here.

extras.text: This brooch is made of a mysterious white metal.  Strangely, it is on fire but it is not consumed or melted.  It must have taken it from a powerful pyromancer at one time and hidden ever since.

objects.ground: A dark longsword covered with blood is floating just above the ground here.

extras.text: This huge two handed longsword is made of a mysterious magical black steel. The blade is the sharpest you have ever seen, and with all that weight behind it, it can be very deadly.  There are still traces of blood on the tip of the sword from a recent killing.  The hilt has several carvings on it but the largest one is of a thorn.  Next to the thorn is a small plaque that probably has the owner's name on it.
PROPERTY OF THE GREAT YIX'XYUA, USED BY HIM IN ALL HIS BATTLES

objects.ground: A very dark but bright ball of light floats above the ground here.

extras.text: This ball of light is the most mysterious and magical things you have ever seen.  The ball is very bright but yet dark at the same time.  The light shifts from top to bottom and from side to side with small flares from time to time. This is a miniature replication of the sun at midnight on some parts of the earth.  Some great conjurer must have made this and given it to some great person as a prize.

objects.ground: A large black thorn lies on the ground here.

extras.text: This large black thorn is the symbol of the dark monks.  It is a real thorn that grows wild only inside the living place of the dark monks.  This thorn belongs to the leader of the dark monks, Yix'Xyua.  He has had this thorn ever since he became the leader of the dark monks.  The thorn itself is about six inches in length and its long pointy thorns are as sharp as ever.  It has a mysterious dark glow to it that gives it a sense of magic and power.

objects.ground: &9&bA dark path of material is floating just above the ground here.&0
A pair of bronze knuckles is lying on the floor here just waiting to be worn.

extras.text: These knuckles are made of pure bronze.  It fits right into your fist and is deadly when used on others.  There are small spikes on the knuckles that would seriously devastate someone's body if hit hard enough.  These knuckles can only be used by monks as only they possess the requisite training in martial arts.

objects.short: a breastplate made of white mythril
objects.ground: A gleaming piece of thin white metal is lying in the dirt here.

extras.text: This breastplate is made out of pure mythril.  The white color and the amount of mythril used must have made this breastplate very expensive to make. Mythril is a very special material that is very thin and lightweight and thin but is as strong as dragon scales.  This breastplate looks to have saved many a man in battle.

objects.ground: A small fang made of what looks like mist wavers in the light here.

extras.text: This mysterious earring once belonged to a powerful monk that still roams the realm somewhere.  The earring itself is made completely of a wondrous mist. You cannot see how it stays together but some great power keeps it from moving.

objects.ground: A dark almost invisible mask lies here sending twisted beams of light all over the room.

extras.text: This mask is one of the most unusual objects you have ever seen.  This mask is made of an almost invisible black material that emits a dark glow of twisted light throughout the room.  This material is very flexible and when worn conforms to your face and is quite hard to get off.  It is also quite durable and could easily withstand a blow from any weapon.

objects.ground: A coil of flame with an obsidian handle lies here.

extras.text: A smooth, glassy obsidian handle wrapped in bloodstained black leather acts as a grip for this whip of fire.  Its lash is a single tongue of flame which moves, snakelike, of its own volition.  Searing heat emitting from the ends of the whip promises severe pain to anyone caught on the receiving end.

objects.ground: A shining black sword floats in the air here.

extras.text: A sword made of pitch black metal seems to suck in light and leave only darkness, yet it shines with a hunger and lust for blood.  It floats rather than dropping to the ground, held up by its own magic.  Its hilt is wrapped in finely tooled black leather, at once soft to the touch and providing a fine grip.  The pommel is set with a black stone glowing with a cold inner light.

objects.short: a cloak of smoke and fire
objects.ground: A smoldering pile of fabric lies here.

extras.text: Is it real fabric?  Hard to say, since this cloak seems to be constantly on fire, sending up plumes of smoke to obscure its wearer.  It seems like a simple wide-weave, thick-threaded back cloak, except for the heat dripping off the fabric like oil.  The favor of the dark gods is said to be bestowed with items like this, for the sulphuric fumes are surely hellish in origin.

objects.ground: A pair of comfortable-looking black gloves lies here.

extras.text: This pair of finely-tooled black gloves has been altered to accommodate for years of abuse.  The thumb, middle, and ring fingers have been cut off from both hands, and the back of the hand is exposed.  A small strap with a steel clasp keeps them securely fastened.

objects.ground: A shining gold torc has been forgotten here.

extras.text: The brilliantly polished gold neckpiece has been inlaid with a repeating pattern of rowan leaves overlapping hemlock.  It is incredibly heavy.

objects.ground: A mask of human skin is sitting here.  Yuck.

extras.text: Gross!  It looks like someone took some finely tanned baby-hide and used it to make a mask.  The features are just a little too even and perfect to be real, but it would probably be a very effective disguise as long as someone didn't look TOO closely.

objects.ground: A pair of sandals with tiny wings attached has been forgotten here.

extras.text: This fine pair of leather sandals comes with a tiny pair of wings attached to each heel which flutter in the breeze.  Made of the finest griffin-hide, they are soft and comfortable, providing excellent support to even the weariest foot.  Someone with these sandals must be fleet of foot indeed!  On the inside back heel, there is an inscription: Fierytag Winner!

objects.ground: The scalp of a Garl'lixxil demon lies here.
A heap of shiny metal rings pulsates with energy.
The fog seems really low here.
A large sword flickers with white flame.
The ethereal disembodied phantom of a soul hovers here.

extras.text: Its vaporous form has no particular mass or substance, instead a seemingly disconnected condensation of living essence.  It glows with a soft, muted light, literally a mere shadow of its former livelihood.  Nevertheless, it pulses with unseen energy from beyond this world, undoubtedly causing interesting side-effects to those nearby.

objects.ground: A warhammer has fallen to the ground here, leaving a deep impression on impact.
A crooked staff has fallen to the ground.
A ragged pouch lies on the floor, exuding a strange smell.

extras.text: This ragged pouch is Fecil's bag of magic focus items.  It permanently stinks from the odd things the old shaman had stored there.

objects.short: a necklace of purple mardi gras beads
objects.ground: A necklace made of shiny purple beads lies here.

extras.text: Ade of a light yet shiny material, this necklace is made of purple beads that are of all different sizes and shapes, from diamond to spherical, to one large, flat, oval-shaped bead at the center.  It has some script on it in large, blocky letters, which reads: Happy Mardi Gras 2006.

objects.short: a necklace of green mardi gras beads
objects.ground: A necklace of shiny green beads lies here.

extras.text: Made of a light yet shiny material, this necklace is made of green beads that are of all different sizes and shapes, from diamond to spherical, to one large, flat, oval-shaped bead at the center.  It has some script on it in large, blocky letters, which reads: Happy Mardi Gras 2006.

objects.ground: An exotic mask has been mindlessly forgotten here.

extras.text: A mask of gauze interwoven with bird feathers and beads lets eyes peer out mysteriously from it, creating an aura of mystique for its wearer.

objects.ground: A blue and white pin is floating just above the ground.

extras.text: Only three inches long, this blue and white pin follows a trisecting path around itself.  From each of it's three points the pin extends following the body of the pin itself tightly.  The pin seems to have something written on it.

objects.ground: A pile of broken glass sits here.

extras.text: This jumble of collected shards form a remarkable vest.  The twisted sensation of the armor numbs the skin quickly as the first touch.  It is apparent this is a powerful armor, mysterious and volatile.

objects.ground: A large piece of black wood has been dropped.

extras.text: This looks to be a piece of rubble, about as large as a small dwarf and made from very knotted wood.  As black as night, this would work very well for hiding in shadows.

objects.ground: A rose, seemingly made of mist, floats in the air.

extras.text: It is a rose, perfectly delineated in soft grey mist, each petal bedewed and fading at the edges.  The stem is also of mist, slightly paler in color.

objects.short: the Quest of the Hunt Necklace
objects.ground: A necklace whose pendant is carved like a wolf lies here.

extras.text: The necklace is made of a heavy silver chain that is somehow as strong as steel. The pendant, carved into the shape of the head of a mighty old wolf, is made of similar material that is somehow much darker than the chain. The back of the pendant is inscribed thus: "The Goddess of the Hunt has bestowed her honors upon thee."

objects.ground: A small wooden harp stands on a base on the floor.

extras.text: This harp is no longer than a grown man's forearm, yet it has enough strings on it to allow any song to be played. The wood is simply cut with no carvings, but is obviously some sort of exotic hardwood -- and carefully stained and treated, so it will last forever.

objects.ground: Whoa! Get this cloak off the ground before someone else does!

extras.text: This ancient artifact told in the tales of old exceeds all your expectations. Just looking at it makes you excited over wearing it, and you pray to gods of Mayhem, and thank them for such a bountiful gift.

objects.short: the Ring of the Dream Realm
objects.ground: A powerful ring lies hidden in the shadows.

extras.text: Drawing power from the mysterious realm of slumber and dreams, this ring molds to your finger giving you a greater understanding of the world around you. The face of the ring is a constantly swirling milky cloud.

objects.ground: A pair of greaves lies here, barely visible.

extras.text: Fitting the greaves around your legs, they mold into place and reform into a hard substance. They seem to be able to custom-fit the person who wears them. The greaves themselves look ghostly in appearance and you find it hard to believe you own such a great artifact.

objects.ground: A patterned dagger emits incredible waves of power right at you.

extras.text: Ripped from the depths of the realm, this artifact radiates energy beyond your understanding. You grasp its hilt and the power of good envelopes you, making you complete in the ways of the light. A new fire burns in your eyes, making you feel refreshed and arrogant.

objects.ground: A shield made of animals' skulls fused together sits here.

extras.text: This is made of 6 leonine skulls, fused together to make a flat and unyielding shield.  The eyes of each skull glow with a faint light, and you have to figure that it holds great magic within.  Taking ahold of the shield, you feel a confidence you haven't felt in a long time.

objects.ground: A pair of leather sandals lies sadly abandoned.

extras.text: Just looking at these sandals makes you feel more capable of moving quickly. Leather straps hold the wearer's feet into a leather-covered footbed; the straps crisscross over the ankles and up the calves. The leather is thick, and a kind of magical aura around the sandals makes them blur out of sight a little.

objects.short: the holy blade of Godly vigor
objects.ground: A glowing holy longsword floats above the ground here.
An unfinished shield of wood is lying here.
A long, double-bladed sword rests against the wall.
A deck of cards is scattered across the ground.
Tall boots, of white leather are here, with white-silvery wings on the sides.

extras.text: The boots stretch white leather just to the knee, buckling all the way up. The tall base and added heel add almost 4 inches of height to the wearer.  On the sides of the boots are small white wings, pressed in white-silver, offering added protection and stability to the footwear.

objects.ground: A large single bladed axe is here embedded into the ground.
Fate has it, that a cruel looking dagger is laying on the ground before you.
A weak looking dagger lays on the ground, waiting to take sweet vengeance on someone.
An eye mask in the shape of two black diamonds has fallen to the ground.
A pile of greenish-grey hide lays here, crumpled on the ground.
A light stretch of transparent silk rests lightly on the ground here.
Some black horse blinders are here on the floor.
A dragon crest shines brightly from the ground.
A glint of light shines up from the ground.
The trunk of an oak lies felled here, most of its branches shorn off.
A gleaming set of full plate floats nearby.
A glowing, ornate battle axe floats here, spinning slowly.
A thin plate of ice resembling a face sits here, chilling its surroundings.

extras.text: The mask is translucent, flaws in the ice partially obscuring the wearer's face.  It shimmers in the ambient light, refracting light through its crystallized surface.  Expressionless ovals allow its wearer to see clearly, but no other blemishes are visible on the exterior of the mask.  The mask's surface is extremely cold to the touch--perhaps it is worn by freezing itself to the wearer's face?

objects.ground: A small pillar of green flame flickers here.

extras.text: The flame seems simultaneously large and small, hot and cold.  Oddly, it feels substantial in your hand, like a soft shapeless mass.  Its soft glow throws a green hue over the area.

objects.ground: A pair of dragonhide gloves lay neatly folded upon the ground.

extras.text: Though they are indeed solid brown leather, these gloves appear to be covered in thick smoke which emanates from the pores of the leathery surface.  The effect of the distortion from the smoke is akin to a heatwave passing through the desert.  Although by appearances they should offer little in the way of protection, these gloves boost the strength and resilience of the dragon whose skin they were crafted from.  There appears to be an inscription on the inside of the right hand glove.
Emblazoned in the leather on the inside of the cuff reads: Specially crafted for a legendary warrior, may his weapons forever haunt his foes.

objects.ground: A solid golden ring gleams in the light.

extras.text: A relief image on the face of the ring depicts a hunter among the trees.  The ring is heavy and thick, allowing it to be used as a seal.  The ring is encircled by a string of what appear to be musical notes.

objects.ground: A large plate metal neckguard rusts here.

extras.text: The bevor is a large plate metal neckguard formed from a single piece that protects the neck and chin.  It is roomy inside, but restricts movement of the head to the left and right.  The back of the neck is left relatively unprotected, so an additional gorget may need to be worn.

objects.ground: A modest fustian plated coat sits here gathering dust.

extras.text: On the outside, the brigandine looks like a regular sleeveless fustian coat, but the outline of steel plates inside the fabric can be seen on the interior of the coat.  The plates are attached to the fabric using latten rivets, which form decorative patterns across the front and back of the coat.

objects.ground: A steel helmet with a snout-like visor is sitting here.

extras.text: It's a large bascinet helmet with a heavy steel visor that protrudes from the face a few inches, reminiscent of a dog's snout.  The muzzle protects the face from physical strikes, but greatly limits the wearer's visibility.

objects.ground: Shiny gray leg-mail lies here in a heap.

extras.text: These chausses are just long enough to extend past the knee.  The flexible mail allows a wide range of movement and resilient protection against slashing attacks.

objects.short: a pair of white snow boots
objects.ground: Blinding white boots sit here getting dirty.

extras.text: These boots are made from bright white fabric stuffed with amazingly warm cotton.  They offer a good amount of protection, but promise to become scuffed easily.

objects.ground: A pair of soft brown gloves sit here.

extras.text: They're soft and supple!  And cute!

objects.ground: A pair of red steel rerebraces are propped up here.

extras.text: The rerebraces cover the upper arm, extending down just past the elbow.  They are crafted from an exquisite red steel which feels warm to the touch, but it may just be a trick of the brain...

objects.ground: Runes decorate the cobalt face of a shield lying face-up here.

extras.text: The shield is light, made from compressed wood layers, and its cobalt face is covered in golden runes, suggesting it may be meant simply as a decorative piece.  However, an aura of power about the shield seems to hint at an invisible strength within it.

objects.ground: A shiny greenish pile of fabric lies here.

extras.text: It's a simple rectangular piece of expensive greenish sea-silk.  The shawl offers no real protection from the elements or from physical attacks, but it seems to be blessed by the sea's spirit.

objects.ground: A belt lined with pouches sits here.

extras.text: It's a simple canvas belt lined with pouches.  Each belt can be tied with a bit of twine to make sure one's belongings don't fall out.

objects.ground: A large silvery ring gleams here.

extras.text: This large silvery ring looks like it could fit loosely around a wrist.  A series of random runes is etched into the band.  This metal has the odd property that runes written in ink upon its surface become permanently etched in silver.

objects.ground: A pair of black lenses sits here.

extras.text: This pair of glasses is odd in that both its lenses are almost pitch black.  Facing them, it is impossible to see through them, but from behind the lenses, vision is clear, if slightly darkened.  Some things appear visible through the lenses that are invisible otherwise.

objects.ground: A pitch-black mask rests here, putting a pall across the room.

extras.text: The mask is made from an unidentifiable smooth black material.  Its edges are blurry, making it difficult to tell just how big this mask actually is.  When worn, it completely covers the wearer's face, obscuring his or her identity entirely.

objects.ground: What looks like a burning fang of a snake lies here.

extras.text: This looks to be a tiny cloud of flame formed from magic in the shape of the fang of a beast of prey.

objects.ground: A small golden chain with a tiny clip lies curled up here.

extras.text: This is a small chain of tiny golden links.  The chain ends in a small golden charm set with a sapphire gemstone.

objects.ground: A black knapsack is here collecting dust.

extras.text: It's a plain-looking black knapsack.  But it harbors a dark secret: there's only one pocket.  But it's really big.

objects.ground: A small curving dark green claw lies here on the ground.

extras.text: This is a six inch dark green claw, seeming from an ancient reptile or perhaps gigantic bird which extends to an extremely sharp point.  The claw has been skillfully mounted upon a hilt by a true dagger-master, creating a potentially deadly weapon.  The dagger sides themselves appear to be pitted with age and exposure, but the blade and tip are completely sharp and lethal.

objects.ground: A long bamboo sword lies here.

extras.text: The shinai is expertly crafted from long, hardened bamboo slats bound together by a white leather nakayui and a saki-gawa fitting on the tip.  The tsuka-gawa hilt is made from thick canvas, making a well-fit, comfortable grip.

objects.ground: A gleaming white-steel sword hums softly here.

extras.text: The sword is quite extravagant, its exquisitely crafted white-steel blade gleaming in the light.  A solid line of gold runs the length of the sword, broken by a large blue sapphire set in the guard.  The gem seems to be emitting a soft hum, its static crackling reminiscent of a heavenly windstorm.

objects.ground: A dark cobalt sword sits here, burning the ground beneath it.

extras.text: The sword is cast from a dark, cobalt-hued steel accented by a deep black that follows the blade's edge.  A fiery red sphere sits in the middle of the hilt, radiating warmth throughout the grip and base of the sword.  Every so often, a black spark crackles on the surface of the sphere; it almost appears as if a tiny creature is trapped within its murk.

objects.ground: Waves of holy justice emanate from a large warhammer sitting here.

extras.text: A holy presence is evident in this large warhammer; an aura of absolute justice surrounds it and its wielder.  The hammer itself appears fairly average: the handle is about three feet long and the end offers the dual thread of a hammer head and a large metal spike, allowing the warhammer to crush unprotected skulls or pierce thin armor.  This weapon is sure to bring the enemies of its wielder to certain justice.

objects.ground: A long, slender pole lies here flowering.

extras.text: The quarterstaff is cut from a length of rich, strong hawthorn wood, running approximately seven feet between tips.  Finely decorated metal caps adorn the ends, their wickedly carved spikes allowing the staff to serve a dual purpose as a spear.  Most surprisingly, however, are the fresh flowers budding off the wood.  They seem to be very much alive, despite growing from wood no longer part of a tree.

objects.ground: A poorly constructed paper helmet lies here, crumpled slightly.

extras.text: Crafted from the shoddiest paper, this helmet is both weak and uncomfortable. It sits lighter on the head than a regular helmet, and doesn't seem to provide any protection at all.  Large splotches of a reddish-brown ooze decorate its outer surface, looking like dirt and poop.

objects.ground: A longsword glitters here like the night sky.

extras.text: The longsword is forged from the blackest of metals, but an eerie glitter covers the surface, twinkling like the summer's night sky.  It is said this blade was once used by the hands of evil against its own.

objects.ground: A shard of a red dragonscale lies here, glowing faintly, like an ember.

extras.text: Merely a chip off a much larger dragonscale, this shard seems to have retained much of the resilience of its previous owner.  Faint ridges run across the shard's red surface, swirling and squiggling almost into recognizable images. The shard of dragonscale is very warm to the touch, apparently maintaining some of the heat from the dragon it once protected.  A tiny clip is attached to the back of the shard, allowing it to be fastened to a cloak or tunic.  A small dragon claw is etched into the clip.

The dragon claw etching on the clip is minute, half the width of a pinky finger, but its detail is exquisite, with every scale on the claw painfully chiseled into the metal.  The claw has a burning blue color, its glow somehow drawing you in...

objects.ground: A shard of a sapphire dragonscale lies here, glinting in the light.

extras.text: Just a small portion of a much larger dragonscale, this shard retains the beautiful glitter of its original parent.  It almost appears cut, as if by a jeweler, but faint ridges running along its back hint at its organic origin. The dragonscale shard is cool to the touch, almost sucking the warmth right out of its surroundings.  A tiny clip on the back of the shard allows it to be fastened to a cloak or tunic.  A small dragon claw is etched into the clip.

The dragon claw etching on the clip is minute, half the width of a pinky finger, but its detail is exquisite, with every scale on the claw painfully chiseled into the metal.  The claw has a burning blue color, its glow somehow drawing you in...

objects.ground: A shard of a silver dragonscale lies here, shimmering like a mirror.

extras.text: Not much more than a sliver from a much larger dragonscale, this shard still has the metallic strength of its original owner.  It appears to have been haphazardly broken off a dragonscale, leaving one edge ragged and sharp.  The dragonscale is cool and reflective, almost like a mirror.  A tiny pin is set in the back of the shard, making it easy to clip onto a cloak or tunic.  A small dragon claw is etched into the clip.

The dragon claw etching on the clip is minute, half the width of a pinky finger, but its detail is exquisite, with every scale on the claw painfully chiseled into the metal.  The claw has a burning blue color, its glow somehow drawing you in...

objects.ground: A shard of viridian dragonscale lies here, glittering like an emerald.

extras.text: Not much more than a sliver from a much larger dragonscale, the surface of this shard still has the lustrous glitter of its original wearer.  The edges are marred by jagged claw-like marks though, as if the shard were torn from the whole scale by force.  A tiny pin on the back of the shard makes it easy to clip onto a cloak or tunic.  A small dragon claw is etched into the clip.

The dragon claw etching on the clip is minute, half the width of a pinky finger, but its detail is exquisite, with every scale on the claw painfully chiseled into the metal.  The claw has a burning blue color, its glow somehow drawing you in...

objects.ground: A shard of golden dragonscale lies here, glimmering with light.

extras.text: Not much more than a sliver from a much larger dragonscale, the surface of this shard still has the golden glow of its original beast.  The shard is heavily polished, giving it a beautiful brushed sheen.  The shard feels heavy, as though it was cast from solid gold.  On the back of the scale, a tiny pin makes it easy to clip onto a cloak or tunic.  A small dragon claw is etched into the clip.

The dragon claw etching on the clip is minute, half the width of a pinky finger, but its detail is exquisite, with every scale on the claw painfully chiseled into the metal.  The claw has a burning blue color, its glow somehow drawing you in...

objects.ground: A long pair of off-white stockings lies here, crumpled.

extras.text: Sewn from the finest off-white cotton threads, this well-worn pair of previously owned stockings promise its wearer warmth and comfort no matter the environment.  Some slight stains mar the stretchy fabric, but they are undoubtedly just an artifact of the production process.

objects.ground: A strip of canvas rests here.

extras.text: The armband is made from heavy canvas, with several large pockets around its circumference.  Several clasps allow the armband to be affixed on an arm, beneath one's heavier armor.

objects.ground: A large green wreath is propped up here.

extras.text: Constructed from a large bough of an evergreen tree, twisted back upon itself into a large circle, this wreath smells with the wondrous winter scent of Christmas.  Various pine cones and berries are tied into the wreath, and a large red bow on one side adds a vibrant splash of color to the decoration. The hole in the center is fairly wide, probably large enough to fit over your head...

objects.ground: A pale ceramic mask grins up at you from the ground.

extras.text: The mask is a stark white, depicting a man with strong features and a jovial grin.  The lips and cheeks are dusted pink, and the mustache and eyebrows are painted black.  The edges of the mouth are slightly upturned in a knowing smile.  Something appears to be written on the inside.

The inside of the mask is a little gritty, a result of the unpolished ceramic.  A short message is penned impossibly small on the inside of the chin: Remember, remember the Fifth of November, The Gunpowder Treason and Plot, I know of no reason Why Gunpowder Treason Should ever be forgot.

objects.ground: Some leathery, dark green gauntlets sit here, accumulating stink.

extras.text: The gauntlets are crafted from finely treated alligator skin, its leathery surface offering a balance of durability and flexibility. The insides of the gauntlets are padded with softer cloth.

objects.ground: A shiny white leather bracer sits here getting dirty.

extras.text: This ketoh is a unique white leather bracer, carefully bound by beautiful brown leather straps.  It is long enough to cover from the wrist to midway up the forearm, featuring a center motif which depicts a flying white griffin.  A line of rich turquoise gems line the edges of the ketoh.  The inside is comfortably padded with cotton and linen.

objects.ground: A small pair of stylish spectacles sits here.

extras.text: The spectacles are sleek and stylish with a wiry silver frame and soft, blue-tinted lenses.  Looking through the glasses seems to make the whole world look cooler, but everything seems to move just a little slower...

objects.ground: A small white and almost translucent skull lays here.

extras.text: Humming with magical power it resonates on a primal level.  This skull must have belonged to a baby dragon or have been shrunken by some great magic maybe both?  Its neutral power appears to trail out looking for some other power to mingle and mix with.

objects.ground: A bright red Christmas stocking looks as though it's been left behind.

extras.text: A bright red christmas stocking, it looks comfortable and warm, fitting snuggly on just about any head.  It has a large, white puffy ball that hangs from the end of the stocking and glittering letters that read : Jolly Fat Bastard.
Ye are now the proud owner of a 2002 Christmas stocking from Pergus

objects.ground: A &3cornucopia&0 lies here on the ground, full beyond belief.
Some burning demon eyes lie here, on fire.

extras.text: A pair of demonic-looking eyes, dark-rimmed and loathsome, burn here with a flame that is not borne of wood.  No heat rises from the fire that engulfs the orbs, and they are not held onto the face by any kind of strings or supports, instead hovering before the eyes and infecting all the wearer sees with a flaming malevolence.

objects.ground: A delicate ring with a small flower made of crystal lies here.

extras.text: This ring has a slight glow.  The flower which is magically attached to the band is made of crystal.  The band itself is a pale jade, carved perfectly to fit a slender finger.  There is a magical power about it would cause the ring to react badly to the wrong kinds of people.  It has a beautiful quality and glow about it, which no doubt helps the person wearing the ring to be stronger and gives them a special, friendly quality.

objects.ground: A pair of shiny gauntlets lies on the ground.

triggers.name: Quest Journal
triggers.commands: if !%arg% osend %actor% This journal tracks all your quest information as you journey through Ethilien! osend %actor% &3=======================================&0 osend %actor% &3OVERVIEW&0 osend %actor% Quests will be revealed in this journal as you become eligible to take them on.  There are main indexes organized around the type of quest, and then detailed entries for each individual quest. osend %actor% The quest journal will always have your most recent personal quest records in it, no matter which copy you look at. osend %actor% &0 osend %actor% To look at a category of quests, type "look journal (category name)". osend %actor% To look at a specific quest, type: "look journal (quest name)". osend %actor% &0 osend %actor% For more on the general quest system, see &6&b[HELP QUEST]&0. osend %actor% &3=======================================&0 osend %actor% There are five types of quests: osend %actor% 1. &3&bADVENTURE&0 quests osend %actor% - These quests take you through areas and explore the story behind each place you encounter.  These quests often culminate in a boss battle and have excellent rewards!&_ osend %actor% 2. &3&bEQUIPMENT&0 quests osend %actor% - These quests take you all across the world reward you with top-tier equipment.  These often take many levels to complete and require vast exploration, but some are focused on a particular zone. osend %actor% 3. &3&bHEROES FOR HIRE&0 quests osend %actor% - These quests are types of bounty hunts, tasking you with hunting down a particular target.  They increase in difficulty across a hero's lifetime! osend %actor% 4. &3&bSPELL&0 quests osend %actor% - These quests challenge you to take on the strongest monsters, find the most valuable treasures, and delve into the deepest secrets Fiery has to offer.  The rewards are supreme magic, unrivaled magic.  Quest songs and chants are included in this category. osend %actor% 5. &3&bSUBCLASS&0 quests. osend %actor% - These quests can be undertaken by a low-level character to change from a core class to a subclass.  Much more information can be found in &6&b[HELP SUBCLASS]&0. osend %actor% - Only characters in core classes within the proper level range will see what quests are available to them on this page. osend %actor% &_ osend %actor% Read or look at any of the five sections above to see what's currently available: ADVENTURE, EQUIPMENT, HIRE, SPELL, SUBCLASS. return 0 endif

triggers.name: Adventure quests
triggers.commands: if %arg% /= adventure || %arg% /= adventures return 0 osend %actor% &3=========== ADVENTURE QUESTS ==========&0 osend %actor% Adventure is waiting! osend %actor% Explore the regions of Ethilien. osend %actor% Fight epic monsters, earn legendary rewards, and increase your might. osend %actor% &3&b[Look]&0 at the key words in a quest title for your current status. osend %actor% &3=======================================&0&_ osend %actor% &2&bAVAILABLE QUESTS:&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uTwisted Sorrow&0 osend %actor% Can you heal the sorrows of the Twisted Forest? osend %actor% Recommended Level: 10 if %actor.has_completed[twisted_sorrow]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[twisted_sorrow]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uCombat in Eldoria&0 osend %actor% The Third Black Legion and the Eldorian Guard, along with their allies in Split Skull and the Abbey, are locked in eternal warfare. osend %actor% Characters may align themselves with the forces of good or the forces of evil. osend %actor% But beware, once made that decision cannot be changed! osend %actor% Minimum Level: 10 if %actor.quest_stage[black_legion]% set status Continuous else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uThe Finale&0 osend %actor% Defeat wild monkeys, recover keys, and help the theatre troupe perform their fiery Finale! osend %actor% Recommended Level: 10 if %actor.quest_stage[theatre]% set status Repeatable else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ if %actor.level% >= 10 osend %actor% &2&b&uThe Horrors of Nukreth Spire&0 osend %actor% Slay the gnolls of Nukreth Spire and liberate their captives. osend %actor% Multiple outcomes and multiple rewards await! osend %actor% This quest is infinitely repeatable. osend %actor% Recommended Level: 20 if %actor.quest_stage[nukreth_spire]% set status Repeatable else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.level% >= 35 osend %actor% &2&b&uLiberate Fiery Island&0 osend %actor% Save Fiery Island from the usurping demigod. osend %actor% Minimum Level: 55 osend %actor% - Some rewards can be received starting at level 35. if %actor.has_completed[fieryisle_quest]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[fieryisle_quest]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.level% >= 30 osend %actor% &2&b&uTower in the Wastes&0 osend %actor% Help the injured halfling find his brother! osend %actor% Recommended Level: 40 if %actor.has_completed[krisenna_quest]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[krisenna_quest]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.level% >= 35 osend %actor% &2&b&uSiege Mystwatch Fortress&0 osend %actor% The dead fortify their position just outside the town of Mielikki. osend %actor% Stop them before they can invade! osend %actor% Recommended Level: 45 if %actor.quest_stage[mystwatch_quest]% set status Repeatable else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.level% >= 45 osend %actor% &2&b&uDestroy the Cult of the Griffin&0 osend %actor% A sect of griffin-worshiping cultists has invaded a druid enclave in the middle of the Arabel Ocean. osend %actor% Smash the cult before they achieve their nefarious goals! osend %actor% Recommended Level: 60 if %actor.has_completed[griffin_quest]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[griffin_quest]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.level% >= 85 osend %actor% &2&b&uThe Planes of Doom&0 osend %actor% Prepare yourself to leave the Prime Material Plane for the elemental planes! osend %actor% This quest begins your voyage through the outer planes to banish Lokari, God of the Moonless night. osend %actor% Minimum Level: 85 osend %actor% - This quest begins a storyline intended for characters of level 95+ if %actor.has_completed[doom_entrance]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[doom_entrance]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif endif

triggers.name: Equipment quests
triggers.commands: if %arg% /= equipment return 0 set anti Anti-Paladin set hunterclasses Warrior Ranger Berserker Mercenary set sorcererclasses Sorcerer Illusionist Cryomancer Pyromancer Necromancer osend %actor% &3=========== EQUIPMENT QUESTS ==========&0 osend %actor% These quests often take a large amount of time to complete, spanning dozens of levels. osend %actor% Characters should expect to need large numbers of unique and hard-to-find items. osend %actor% They are generally not intended to be completed quickly. osend %actor% &3&b[Look]&0 at the key words in a quest title for your current status. osend %actor% &3=======================================&0&_ osend %actor% &2&bAVAILABLE QUESTS:&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uGuild Armor Phase One&0 osend %actor% Crafters across Ethilien will ask you to bring them gems and junked up armor so they can fix it up and present you with something new. osend %actor% Your home guild master is always the best place to start. osend %actor% Min Level: 1 if %actor.quest_stage[phase_armor]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uGuild Armor Phase Two&0 osend %actor% Crafters across Ethilien will ask you to bring them gems and junked up armor so they can fix it up and present you with something new. osend %actor% Min Level: 21 if %actor.quest_stage[phase_armor]% >= 2 set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uGuild Armor Phase Three&0 osend %actor% Crafters across Ethilien will ask you to bring them gems and junked up armor so they can fix it up and present you with something new. osend %actor% Min Level: 41 if %actor.quest_stage[phase_armor]% >= 3 set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ if %sorcererclasses% /= %actor.class% osend %actor% &2&b&uAcid Wand&0 osend %actor% Masters of earth will help you create and upgrade a %status%&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uAir Wand&0 osend %actor% Masters of air will help you create and upgrade a new mystic weapon. if %actor.has_completed[air_wand]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[air_wand]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uFire Wand&0 osend %actor% Masters of fire will help you create and upgrade a new mystic weapon. if %actor.has_completed[fire_wand]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[fire_wand]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uIce Wand&0 osend %actor% Masters of ice and water will help you create and upgrade a new mystic weapon. if %actor.has_completed[ice_wand]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[ice_wand]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.class% /= Assassin osend %actor% &2&b&uDeadly Promotion&0 osend %actor% Assassins who have proven to be efficient bounty hunters can work their way up in the Guild to earn special masks. if %actor.has_completed[assassin_mask]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[assassin_mask]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.class% /= Priest || %actor.class% /= Cleric osend %actor% Clerics and priests can make pilgrimages to various spiritual masters to craft weapons to smite the undead. osend %actor% &2&b&uSpirit Maces&0 if %actor.has_completed[phase_mace]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[phase_mace]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.class% /= Paladin || %actor.class% == %anti% osend %actor% &2&b&uDivine Devotion&0 osend %actor% Prove your devotion to your cause after slaying a dragon, be it justtice or destruction, and receive a divine reward. if %actor.has_completed[paladin_pendant]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[paladin_pendant]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif if %hunterclasses% /= %actor.class% osend %actor% &2&b&uEye of the Tiger&0 osend %actor% Mighty warriors who have bested the biggest beasts can further prove their %status%&0&_ endif if %actor.level% >= 35 osend %actor% &2&b&uMystery of the Rhell Forest&0 osend %actor% Find the sick merchant in the Rhell Forest and help end his distress. osend %actor% %actor.has_completed[emmath_flameball]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ elseif %actor.quest_stage[sunfire_rescue]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif endif

triggers.commands: if %arg% /= heroes || %arg% /= hire return 0 osend %actor% &3=========== HEROES FOR HIRE ===========&0 osend %actor% These hired jobs provide some quick cash and good thrills with some of Ethilien's most iconic creatures. osend %actor% &3&b[Look]&0 at the key words in a quest title for your current status. osend %actor% &3=======================================&0&_ osend %actor% &2&bAVAILABLE QUESTS:&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uBeast Masters&0 osend %actor% Battle the most ferocious animals on Ethilien, mundane and magical alike. osend %actor% This quest spans from level 1 to 90. if %actor.has_completed[beast_master]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[bounty_hunt]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ osend %actor% &2&b&uContract Killers&0 osend %actor% Sow some chaos by taking out key figures across the world. osend %actor% This quest spans from level 1 to 90. if %actor.has_completed[bounty_hunt]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[elemental_chaos]% set status In Progress else set status Not Started endif osend %actor% &6Status: %status%&0&_ endif

triggers.name: Troll Mask progress journal
triggers.commands: if %arg% /= tribal || %arg% /= trouble || %arg% /= tribal_trouble || %arg% /= troll_mask || %arg% /= troll || %arg% /= troll mask quest if %actor.race% /= troll if %actor.level% >= 45 return 0 set job1 %actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37080]% set job2 %actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37081]% set job3 %actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37082]% osend %actor% &2&b&uTribal Trouble&0 osend %actor% Minimum Level: 55 if !%actor.quest_stage[troll_quest]% set status Not Started elseif %actor.has_completed[troll_quest]% set status Completed! elseif %actor.quest_stage[troll_quest]% == 1 set status In Progress endif osend %actor% &6Stats: %status%&0&_ if %actor.quest_stage[troll_quest]% == 1 osend %actor% Quest Master: %get.mob_shortdesc[37000]% osend %actor% &0 osend %actor% %get.mob_shortdesc[37000]% told you: osend %actor% Long ago, three powerful items of the trolls were stolen by jealous shamans from different tribes and hidden away. osend %actor% If you were to bring the objects back to me, I could reward you quite handsomely.&_ osend %actor% - One is the bough of a sacred mangrove tree that stood in the courtyard of a great troll palace before it was destroyed by a feline god of the snows. osend %actor% - One is a vial of red dye made from the blood of our enemies, stolen by a tribe in a canyon who wished to unlock its power. osend %actor% - One is a large hunk of malachite, a stone we have always valued for its deep green color.  Our enemies the swamp lizards also liked its color, however, and guard it jealously. if %job1% || %job2% || %job3% osend %actor% &0 osend %actor% You have found the following items: if %job1% osend %actor% - %get.obj_shortdesc[37080]% endif if %job2% osend %actor% - %get.obj_shortdesc[37081]% endif if %job3% osend %actor% - %get.obj_shortdesc[37082]% endif endif osend %actor% &0 osend %actor% You still need to find: if !%job1% osend %actor% - %get.obj_shortdesc[37080]% endif if !%job2% osend %actor% - %get.obj_shortdesc[37081]% endif if !%job3% osend %actor% - %get.obj_shortdesc[37082]% endif endif endif endif endif
